snippet.title: Echoed World – Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Echoed World is available on Steam completely free!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/740470/Echoed_World/

Experience the epic journey of Algiz, the architect of life, as he seeks to retrieve his stolen power. But not only has his power been stolen. The whole world he designed is on a brink of destruction. 

Echoed World is a charming platformer, where mechanics and a story are bound together. The protagonist can no longer create life, but he can still manipulate with what has been already created. This process requires a lot of sacrifices to be made, but is often the only way to traverse through a slowly dying world, where creations are turning against their creator.

Website: http://echoedworld.com/
Twitter: http://twitter.com/EchoedWorld
Facebook: http://fb.me/EchoedWorld
Instagram: http://instagram.com/echoedworld
Development Blog: http://echoedworld.com/development-blog

Presskit: http://echoedworld.com/presskit/sheet.php?p=echoed_world
